https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/hUwR4pro0b3V2XdB41EzljHda6E.jpg Tim Trageser's TV drama focuses on a couple whose love passes through a crisis when they start a weekend relationship. Jan and Maria are a young and happy couple, living in the country with their little daughter. When Maria gets the tempting offer to work as chef in a refined Berlin restaurant, Jan confirms her intention to accept. However, they estrange more and more from each other after a short while... Written by fippi2000 Ein verlockendes Angebot
